website_summaries.verdict: Tops the list of joint supplements to assist with pain relief from arthritis, inflammation, and fibromyalgia.
pros: Very simple to mix and if taken regularly the results can be fantastic
Unflavored mix can be added to any beverage you prefer
Multiple users prefer this to taking pills
cons: The price point has increased over the years, but the benefits are still worth it

customer_reviews.title: 00 a can so had to look AT the ingredients and found good substitutes that I still use
customer_reviews.text: I started using this over 20 years ago and help so much with joints. I had to quit using because somehow the prices went up to over $60.00 a can so had to look AT the ingredients and found good substitutes that I still use. Just a year ago found they dropped the price so it is affordable again now I still buy it but give it to my husband because the substitutes of collagen and gelatin (there are differences) I found are working great for me and my husband has been taking it and at 71 has no joint pain still working over 40 hours a day. PRAISE THE LORD!
customer_reviews.author: hotsy7

customer_reviews.title: I thought the powder would be as good but my shoulder problems haven't diminished after using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to take the Bio-flex pills but they were so huge that I struggled with swallowing them. I decided to try taking the powder which is completely tasteless and mixes well with juice, but after taking it for a month I am not excited with the results. I noticed with the pills a problem I've had with my shoulder really subsided. I thought the powder would be as good but my shoulder problems haven't diminished after using it every night for a month. I think I will try something else.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Took 3 steady days to relive jount pain. U will love it
customer_reviews.text: I have joint pain at 56 years young, and this product took a steady 3 days to feel better. I didn't have to wear a knee or ankle brace after 3 days. I am thrilled about it. Tastes good in your own juice, not plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Lesha

customer_reviews.title: There may be other powdered products with additional components like chondroitin (sic
customer_reviews.text: Being in powdered form I put a scoop in my morning coffee. I have found it to be many times more effective than the pill form of glucosamine. I am 62 years old and closing in on my 300th marathon or longer. I have used this product for most of the last 20 years, when I could find it. There may be other powdered products with additional components like chondroitin (sic?), but for the price, this product is very cost-efficient and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Osteo Bi Flex Nutra Joint is a terrific product which worked relief for my joints.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Osteo Bi Flex Nutra Joint for several years. It has done wonders keeping my joints from hurting. I was sad to see that Amazon is no longer offering it as they didn't know when it would become available. I can't emphasize enough what that product has done for me Since it is no longer available I can tell a difference in the way my joints have started hurting more. This was not an issue when I was taking the product. If there is any way at all to start offering this product I will be one happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Stewart

customer_reviews.title: patience - seniors heal slower than younger - BUT results will follow AND HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Long time user - recommender of the product - does not fail to deliver results
customer_reviews.author: Lt Yester

customer_reviews.title: great help for the body for rebuilding, or maintaining joint health
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really helps my joints. In my fifties with many motocross injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lewis

customer_reviews.title: looks like re-named. But the same product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 8 years now. A brief lapse when Knox stopped making it as Nutra Joint, but now using it again, looks like re-named. But the same product, apparently. Anyway, I'm back on it, I recommend it to all my friends and family. It helps a lot, I can't say it eliminates all little problems with the joints, but it is a major improvement. I'll keep taking it as long as they keep making it. I put it in my morning coffee, can't even taste it. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Liked old one better.
customer_reviews.text: I used Knox Nutra Joint successfully and had great relief from knee pain. However, When product was produced by Osteo Biflex it no longer gave me any relief. Is there a product currently with the same formulation as the previous Knox Nutrajoint?
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ahern

customer_reviews.title: I didn't "feel" this product like I do the Schiff product
customer_reviews.text: I gave Osteo Bi-Flex about 6 weeks to demonstrate effectiveness to me before switching to Schiff glucosamine with chondroitin and MSM. I didn't "feel" this product like I do the Schiff product. I lift heavy weights 4X a week and separately workout on the treadmill, exercise bike, or hike about 4X a week. After 3 weeks of using Schiff, my aches and pains go away. It mixes easily, but I do throw it in a shake and blend it with my magic bullet for ultimate smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: AtlasSub34

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker...
customer_reviews.text: Helped with my knee problem. This is a keeper and i will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn095

customer_reviews.title: I actually use this for my dogs. i have ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for my dogs. i have Danes that are 6 and 8 years old, and they are obviously feeling the joint issues. I give them each a scoop a day in their food and it has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: cydney williams

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend to Get You Through Regular Exercise Without Pain!
customer_reviews.text: Can't run without this stuff! Running is hard on my knees. Soon after I started, the pain was threatening to make me quit. I did some research, and found this. I took it daily, and was able to keep running, with absolutely NO pain. Miraculous! If you're allergic to shellfish, you can't use this, as it is made from shrimp shells.
customer_reviews.author: MNoelleA

customer_reviews.title: Great way to take your vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Mixable with yogurt and smoothies. Love my osteo bi flex in powder form. It really has no flavor! Easy to take. For me it’s better than large pills.
customer_reviews.author: Ana D. Guevara

customer_reviews.title: The best joint supplement
customer_reviews.text: My 91 year old mother uses OsteoBiflex with NutraJoint for arthritis in her knees and hands. She sure doesn't act 91 years old. This stuff really does work....however, you have to use it everyday just as directed....you cannot stop once you "feel better". She takes it faithfully same time everyday and has no problems. Before her knee would "lock up" on her at anytime of night/day. You wont be sorry if you try this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: itsthejo

customer_reviews.title: Simply put, it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use NutraJoint, and we have for several years. Previously, we used tablets but those did not seem to be absorbed. I can honestly say that we noticed wonderful results after less than two weeks. We even give it to our 11 year old shepherd/boxer mix (who weighs over 100 lbs) for her joint pain, and she is well able to keep up with our 4, 6, and 8 year olds in the yard. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kitka's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and have used it for over 25 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for over 25 years. So thankful that I can order it on Amazon as all retail stores have quit stocking it. Best joint product out there.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: It helps my mom's knees, that's all what matters.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Knox drink mix for my mom and she gave one to her friend. It helps ease the pain and stiffness on my mom's knees as one of her knees had surgery a few years ago. She mixes the powder with her morning milk and it takes fine for her. It has more dramatic effect on her friend. Within a week of daily consuming, her friend was able to walk without much discomfort. I mixed it with my multi-grain powder, and don't think it taste bad at all. I like the latest package that includes vitamin D and Acai. I think this product is worth to give it a try if you have joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: NutraJoint works!
customer_reviews.text: NutraJoint is amazing...it works! Been using it for years on an as-needed basis. When the knees start to hurt, I go back "on" and within days, I'm pain-free. Can't ask more of a product than that! At one point I tried the NutraJoint with both glucosamine and chondroitin...but the chondroitin was not tolerated well, so I went back to just the glucosamine formula. Happy knee, Happy me!
customer_reviews.author: susan k.

customer_reviews.title: ... trouble swallowing the very large pills this product is great. He measures out the amount to be taken ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has trouble swallowing the very large pills and this product is great at solving this problem. He just measures out the amount to be taken and adds a teaspoon to each cup of coffee until he takes all 4 teaspoons. The product does not affect the flavor and really solves a pill swallowing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  From Boston

customer_reviews.title: Won't dissolve
customer_reviews.text: You could stir till Hades froze over and this gunk would be library paste.
customer_reviews.author: Gailkate

customer_reviews.title: goes down easily. It says to give it three months and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff appears to be working so I am going to keep taking it. Stir it into orange juice...no taste, goes down easily. It says to give it three months and I think that's fair. Of all the things I've tried, I think this is working the best and it's not expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Basford

customer_reviews.title: Where to find this powder.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this powder and could not remember who I had gotten it from. I would like to check my price, I believe it was below 55.00.
customer_reviews.author: Gail W.

customer_reviews.title: This mix is better than taking the pills which can get pretty large
customer_reviews.text: This mix is better than taking the pills which can get pretty large. I mix it with water, juice, smoothies or I sprinkle it on my salads. I highly recommend it to anyone who can't or does not want to take pills.
customer_reviews.author: Comely

customer_reviews.title: Mama likes this
customer_reviews.text: My Mom told me she was out of this stuff so I got it for her. It really does help her to keep walking. A thing she loves to do with her bad knee and her arm is also helped by this product. I might have to start using it soon :)
customer_reviews.author: RosAnn

customer_reviews.title: My shoulder and feet hurt so bad from arthritis and I'm taking this along with gelatin ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second container of this stuff. It really helps and I can tell if I go couple of days without it. My shoulder and feet hurt so bad from arthritis and I'm taking this along with gelatin and extra vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: C.F. in GA

customer_reviews.title: product was perfect and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: product was perfect and shipped quickly,however i just started using this per advise my doctor. i hope it helps my knees ,time will tell..
customer_reviews.author: rlsandy

customer_reviews.title: This last can got chunky and lumpy and hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: This last can got chunky and lumpy and hard to mix up. So I put it in smoothly. Luckily it is summer.
customer_reviews.author: ivy wreden

customer_reviews.title: We like this form better than the capsule form
customer_reviews.text: We mix it in our morning orange juice or morning fruit smoothie. We have been using it for several years and have a standing recurring order for this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, sometimes hard to find at a reasonable price. I have degenerative disc disease. Along with back strengthening exercises this supplement has allowed me to be pain free without back surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Reingold

customer_reviews.title: It works good
customer_reviews.text: start using it, after 2 days I noticed a good change in less aching and more flexibility . Now I use it once every day and you can mix it with any drink, water, juice..... will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Faster results than the tablets
customer_reviews.text: My wife introduced me to this option of Osteo Bi-flex. She was right. It took me only a few days to feel the benefits. Of course, the trick is to be consistent and not miss a day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Proudct and Service delivery was very fast will be dealing with them again go with them Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and Proudct and Service delivery was very fast will be dealing with them again go with them Great Stuff I have cerbal palsy and this stuff sure helps my joint issues i have

customer_reviews.title: After about 3 months my hands hurt so bad I could hardly stand to touch anything
customer_reviews.text: I have been using NutraJoint for years. I stopped using it for a while just to see if it made a difference for my arthritis. It did. After about 3 months my hands hurt so bad I could hardly stand to touch anything. I started back to taking it again and doubled the amount for one week and the pain went away. Osteo Bi-flex was added later so I presume that makes it better but the original worked too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Allen

customer_reviews.title: Container comes half full.
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused why the container only came half full. Is that how it is suppose to be?

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: Instead of giving my dog Clucosamine pills I opted for the powder and mix it with her food. Easy and simply way to give this to her.
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint about it is that all the grains do not easily dissolve. So the concoction can be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works for strengthening knees. I put it in OJ and I can tell the difference after a week in how my knees feels. My only complaint about it is that all the grains do not easily dissolve. So the concoction can be a bit lumpy. Tastes better in tomato juice.

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find

customer_reviews.title: This product really eases joint pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use - doesn't have a bad taste and will do a lot to help you have less pain from joints. If I miss a couple of days I can hardly walk but life is great when I take it and I rarely let myself miss it anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Osteo bi-flex nutrajoint
customer_reviews.text: This version with the green cover worked better for me than the one with the orange cover. I just can't afford it every time.

customer_reviews.title: Positive review of NutraJoint
customer_reviews.text: This item helps with tendon and ligament damage and also joint problems. I tend to injure my legs occasionally at work and also while hiking in the hills of north Georgia. My wife has arthritis and although this does not cure her joints it does help alleviate the pain and inflammation. I consider the Nutra joint a reasonable alternative to drugs meant for these conditions and much safer.

customer_reviews.title: helps my joints
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have knee and hip joint pain and this relieves it so I can walk my dogs

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Will not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are great, better than the other brand I bought before BUT I cannot get it to dissolve. Other users said it never does get clear (see photo) which I do not like but can live with. However no matter what I do there is inevitably a gritty particle film on the bottom of my beverage glass. I also get Gritty particles in my mouth when I get to the bottom of the drink. I have tried both hot and cold liquids, letting it sit and stirring it repeatedly. It is so unpleasant that I don’t like taking it which defeats the whole purpose. So I am giving up and going back to the NOW product I used before.
customer_reviews.author: boomer lady

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day in a fruit/veggie drink. I helps my joints and my fingernails - who could ask for anything else!

customer_reviews.title: knox is fab
customer_reviews.text: I use this in smoothie or orange juice each morning and find it really helps my arthritis and general health tremendously. I am not able to take big pills so it works really well. The trick is to disolve it and leave it about 2-3 mins so the cornflour blends with the smoothie and you can hardly know its there.
customer_reviews.author: emmabradielove

customer_reviews.title: Finger Nail Ridges and Splitting Nails
customer_reviews.text: The finger nail ridges and splitting nails are still there but I haven't finished the container of Knox. It will likely take the time to consume at least the whole container and perhaps even a second container to make a difference, if a difference can be made. I use one scoop of the Knox product in either V-8 or citrus juice each day. Sometimes I miss a day. There doesn't seem to be improvement at the base of the nail where the new growth occurs yet either.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hancock

product_meta.title: Osteo BiFlex NutraJoint Drink Mix Glucosamine Joint & Immune Support Formula Unflavored Drink Mix with Gelatin, Calcium and Vitamin D3, 13.86oz
product_meta.description: (1)*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose treat cure or prevent any disease. Individual Results May Vary.
feature_bullets: JOINT HEALTH SUPPORT: Osteo Bi-Flex NutraJoint Drink Mix provides gelatin, calcium, and 50mcg (2000 IU) of Vitamin D3 per serving to help support joint health and immune system health.* NutraJoint is also an excellent source of Vitamin E and other important nutrients.

UNFLAVORED DRINK MIX: Osteo Bi-Flex NutraJoint Drink Mix is unflavored, so you can add it to any beverage, from water to milk to coffee to juice. NutraJoint provides the same calcium, gelatin, and Vitamin D3 without added flavor, making it very versatile.

QUALITY AND INNOVATION: At Osteo Bi-flex, we've been responsible for helping to lead the way in joint care supplements.*(1) Backed by years of commitment from scientists, researchers, technicians and associates our goal is to bring you the best product.

SUPPORTING AND MAINTAINING JOINT HEALTH is key to easily enjoying an active lifestyle while we age.*(1) Osteo Bi-Flex is manufactured under the highest standards for product quality, purity and potency. Osteo Bi-Flex NutraJoint Drink Mix contains shellfish.

COMPARE TO FAVORITES: Compare Osteo Bi-Flex to Schiff, Vimerson Health, Doctor's Best, Zenwise, Kirkland Signature, Move Free, Bio Schwartz, Dr. Tobias, NOW, DONA, Vita Breeze, Divine Bounty, Number One Nutrition, Puritan's Pride, or BioScience Nutrition.
